title: Inama zikoreshwa
content:
Hari amategeko make shingiro ugomba gukurikiza kugira ngo ukore ku buryo wowe n’abandi bumva batekanye kandi banishimiye gukoresha urubuga rwo kuri telefoni rwa The Girl Effect. Iyo utubahirije aya mategeko wakira iburira, ku buryo budahoraho cyangwa kugukura mu barukoresha burundu. Aya mategeko ni:

 - Guhohotera cyangwa kubabaza abandi ntibizihanaganirwa.
 - Wubahe urubyiruko rukoresha kandi ntukoreshe imvugo mbi, isesereza cyangwa ngo utange amahuza  ariho ibikoresho bishora mu busambanyi cyangwa bisesereza.

 - Ntugatange amakuru yawe bwite. Ntukabwire abantu:

    - Izina ryawe nyaryo (shaka irihimbano),
    - Imyaka yawe
    - Aderesi yawe,
    - Izina ry’ikigo wigaho,
    - Imeyiri aderesi cyangwa nomero ya telefoni cyangwa
    - amakuru ajyanye n’imari n’amajambobanga.

 - Kwirinda guhura n’abantu muhuriye kuri interineti. Ariko nimuhura ujye ukora ku buryo ujyana n’umuntu mukuru. Cyangwa umubyeyi wawe cyangwa umwishingizi wawe.

Niba uri munsi y’imyaka 13 ntugomba gukoresha iyi serivisi keretse ubiherewe uruhushya n’umubyeyi wawe cyangwa umwishingizi hanyuma ugakoresha iyi serivisi uyobowe nabo. Urubuga rwo kuri interineti rwa The Girl Effect rukoreshwa n’abantu bafite imyaka 13 kuzamura.
